title: Bering Land Bridge National Preserve: Places to Go
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go             Places to Go         Two tents along the beach. NPS Photo  In the Preserve From granite tors to lava fields and arctic beaches, the 2.7 million acres of the preserve is home to outstanding geological destinations that highlight the park's diverse features.    Nome and Surrounding Areas  Nome provides ample opportunities to explore a landscape similar to that of the preserve while having the amenities of a small rural community.    Village Communities  A short flight from Nome can land you on one of the many native villages that dot the Alaskan coast.
